data.title: Bill Hayes makes final appearance on Days of Our Lives with real life wife in emotional episode
data.meta_description: The love that Bill Hayes and his wife Susan Seaforth Hayes had for each other in real life radiated in the scene they had together on Thursday’s episode of Days of Our Lives
data.text:
Days of Our Lives fans will get a chance to see the late Bill Hayes once more after he died earlier this year.

From 1970 until he died in January 2024 at 98 he portrayed the daytime soap opera’s most notable character Doug Williams. Viewers who tuned in to Days of Our Lives on Thursday got to see Bill’s last appearance as his final episode marked a definite farewell. Sharing the screen with him for his last Days of Our Lives show was actress Susan Seaforth Hayes, 81, who portrays his on-screen wife Julie Williams.

Susan also happens to be Bill’s real-life wife.

She and Bill had been married off-screen since 1974. The love that the pair had for each other in real life radiated in the scene they had together on Thursday’s show. For their captivating scene, Bill and Susan’s characters Doug and Julie reminisced on their romance throughout the years after they found out that their daughter, Abigail, might be alive.

Julie admitted that it was love at first sight when she saw Doug, prompting him to profess his deep appreciation for her.

"I had become a new man," Doug said to Julie. "I had to change to deserve you." Then the couple embraced and shared a kiss. The official Days of Our Lives Instagram account shared a photo from their heartwarming on-screen interaction on the social media platform.

“Today marks the end of an era as we watch Bill Hayes’ final episode on #daysofourlives,” the caption read. “His incredible talent and presence graced our screens for over five decades, bringing joy, drama, and unforgettable moments to Salem.”

The end of the caption read: “Thank you, Bill, for all the memories and the remarkable legacy you created. We miss you! #DOOL #BillHayes #EndOfAnEra.”

Fans praised Bill’s final appearance in the comment section alongside admitting how much they were going to miss him.

“As a viewer since day 1, It's very hard to think of Doug being gone from our story,” one fan shared. “Even more since I know the real life story of Bill & Susan. It feels like a part of my own family is gone and I am heart broken! I am a fan forever & so appreciate all the wonderful 'Day's of our Lives'!”

Another added, “I was tearing up watching their last scene together you will be missed immensely, Sir.”

A third mentioned, “Thank you for sharing this tender moment. Beyond acting and surpassing the pages of the story.”

They continued: “You gave us a glimpse of a love story, not scripted or rehearsed. Unforgettable to all. Rest Easy. You will be missed, but your love will carry on forever.”
